descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Help Dot the pig roll away from the evil wolf chef, thus ruining his dinner plans. With the help of his father and his brother, you will guide Dot to his beloved Princess Rune.

●  Discover crazy worlds
Throughout the escape Dot will encounter various environments, from forests, snow mountains to sci-fi and even maybe a little trip to other worlds. Who knows. Maybe he's an astronaut pig. Maybe he's a super pig that can fly.

●  Conquer your skills
Unlock a variety of power ups to help Dot throughout his escape, as well as discover new outfits for him to wear that give him extra special bonuses when he wears them.
Roll, Jump, shoot and dodge. That’s the way the pig goes.

●  Go shopping
You can upgrade your power ups in the game using the tomato currency. The more tomatoes you collect while you play, the more you can upgrade your power ups and unlock new outfits for Dot!

●  Show off your dance moves
You have trotters instead of your hands! Isn't that a good enough reason to dance?
